content.label: Absolutley terrible.

This is one of the best iOS games I've played. It has a bunch of nods to other games such as Mario, Metriod, and even the Lego people from Mega Man Legends...maybe... However, I came across a glitch while playing a Sir Jumpington while inside a warp pipe. I got stuck and the background went black and I started glitching around the screen collecting a bunch of points. I hope they can get the glitch fixed soon. Besides that small problem it's an amazing game that you'll get addicted to.
Make the guy from 8bit Doves a playable character!
Just try it - it's cool!
Great app. The game is addictive fun that has simply no end. The fact that this game even gets updated just makes it even better.
This game is addicting and is fantastic to play while you wait! I definitely recommend it!
The game doesnt open on me anymore i updated it today :( plz fix soon
The game keeps booting me out. It loads half the nitrome logo then kicks me. I'm on iphone4
The game is amazing, it's just that there's a certain ad in the apple update that crashes the game.
The only complaint I can level at this game is the frequency of ads, but hey, game developers need to eat too.

This is a fun little game, it truly is.  If I'd paid $1.99 (+\-) for an ad-free version of this I'd be giving it five stars.  But the CONSTANT Game of War ads are really annoying.  And probably counterproductive, as if there's one thing I will not be doing anytime soon it's trying out Game of War.  (Their ad campaign has made sure of that.  Blah.)

I like the endless nature, difficulty, and unlockables. Sir Jumpalot's upgrade is buggy though. He gets an extra hit, but when you get hit you lose all the coins you've collected up to that point. That makes it only usable if going for a room high score. Please fix!

I love this game, how simple the controls are, and how all of the characters ( mostly ) are parodies of other video game characters such as Blue Rodent being a parody of Sonic and The pink guy being a parody of Kirby ( maybe ).

I'm sure this game would be great...if I could open it and play it without it freezing. This game is pretty much corning out. It is completely vigorous, and I won't stand for it. Screw this! I'm playing COD!!!!

I agree with the reviewer who said that there should be a character which has all the upgrades/abilities of all other characters.

Something else I would like to see in this game is the addition of boss levels, where you would fight a special enemy/boss after reaching a certain level. It would make sense to include the villains from the games, when you have included the main characters.

Now if I lost one (because of the one I gained on the level), I would understand but I went on a 15 streak and lost all my coins I gained! Ok so update: the thing crashes every time I try to open, had to downgrade to one star because of this because I really wanna play.
I'd give this game 5 stars but the game won't open...I kinda love you guys if you'd fix this problem ASAP but other than that...the game is pretty amazing
I like the game, but it crashes before I get to it
This game has the truly feeling of the classic games.

This is exactly what I look for in a game to have on my phone. U can play for a long time or just a minute. I've noticed the games I play the most on my phone are the ones that couldn't b simpler. No massive profile setup no advanced control scheme just tap to jump and swipe to guide. That being said, side scrollers r my favorite games. Double dragon, contra and of course metroid (hint hint to all of u wondering what character to upgrade first. Probably the best character on the game) and many many more. I play this game more than any other game on my phone and probably use it more than any app I have. It's a rad game
This game run extremely slow on older devices and needs to be limited to higher end devices. The constant frame rate drops make it almost impossible to play and iOS 6 devices(ex: iPod 4th gen)
Nitrome makes my least favorite iOS games of all time. There's absolutely nothing intuitive or manageable about the way you control your movements.
This is a perfect example of retro-platforming (as well as ad-placement) done right on a mobile platform. Keep up the great work guys!

Would love to play this game, but it doesn't get passed the load screen before it force closes.
Bummer. :(

title.label: Full page ads that take 6s to play before close

content.label: Ads totally okay. Full page ads, ehhh whatever I can live with that. Full page ads that play a video, use my data and require me to wait before I can close them? That's a new low.
Hey nitrome in the chance that you read this I really love this game and all the characters but I think their should be even more characters maybe even some recolors of the characters we already have

This game is Awesome.when I started playing Platform Panic,I immediately felt like I wasn't playing an arcade game,but a Metroid game,like the second part of Zero Mission,or super Metroid!
(You may be wondering why I put one star,but I'll explain later!)

Soundtrack 10/10
The soundtrack is incredible and gives a perfect effect,making the game feel arcade.the jump sequence sound effects from the enemy robots is a nice touch too,because I feel like it gives the game that much more of an immersive feel:if it were just background music,it would lack a certain feel for the game.

Graphics 10/10
Along with the soundtrack is the large bit graphics (I don't know the technical term for large bit graphics,but I want to say 8-bit graphics.so I'm just going to say 8-bit,and if I'm wrong,you know what I mean),and they both go hand in hand.The high resolution 8-bit graphics add an excellent touch to the game.many arcade games,at least all that I can think of,have 8-bit graphics,so the idea of a 1080p,Blu-Ray type graphic style doesn't really give the effect,"IM AN ARCADE GAME!!!"also,the 8-bit,high resolution graphics makes it feel even more like an old metriod game,which I really love.

Characters 9/10
I like how many of the characters are ripoffs of other games like (spoilers)Sonic,Metroid,and...dragon ball Z(really?i guess you people really like Japan,or either your Japanese?)???one minor effect that I thought was ironic was the many descriptions of the characters.nice touchðŸ‘!i haven't collected even half the characters yet,but I'm anxious to!

Gameplay 8/10
The only reason I choose 8/10 is because I feel like this game has SOOOO much more potential if you simply added some more modes,which I will explain soon.
The simple touch controls give an INCREDIBLE arcade feel to the game.i Love the instructions too,and how you put them in the first room,pretty cool.Even though I've had this game for about a month,my high score is 21,but I can still play the rooms Over and Over and never get bored...for awhile.simple,sorta creative,yet complete.sorta...
an idea I had was that you should add different game modes.i keep comparing this game to Zero Mission in Metroid,and that's where my ideas originated:each character,when played with,should have their own biome,give the Rosy Cheeks Boy a biome from DBZ,Sonic a biome from Sonic,etc. And give your own characters their own unique biome,so that there's not just one type of background and platform,but you should keep your own enemies,but not add other enemies from any of the copyright characters,just keep your own robots and whatnot to keep it from feeling like your playing a Metroid game,etc.,but add the music from the other games,maybe.

Have arcade mode:the game style already present in this version.endless fun.
Mission mode:instead of having a one way,never ending set of rooms,have multiple entries and exits,same enemies,spikes and room designs (plus a LOT more),and the object of the game is to progress through the area,collect the characters special power-up (plus a few exclusive mission mode extras),and have final bosses that you are required to kill,and make one boss from the copyrighted characters game:a boss from a Metroid,Sonic,and DBZ,and whatever other characters,plus your own bosses.Basically just a REALLY COOL version of an old. Metroid platform game!!!

Miscellaneous 2/10
 My first topic I want to state is one of UTMOST IMPORTANCE!!!it doesn't have to do with game play as much as it has to do with game play interference:adds.I'm not angry about adds,that's not the problem,they only show up twice a blue moon,but there's some serious issues with them...I've played many games,and some of them are really fun like Minecraft,N.O.V.A. 3,and Platform Panic,but the problem with all three of those games is that even if restrictions are put on an iOS device,if someone with an iOS device has Platform Panic,even though restrictions are put on for Safari,or YouTube,YouTube is STILL ACCESSIBLE REGARDLESSðŸ‘¿ðŸ‘¿ðŸ‘¿!after the add video plays,it shows pics and whatnot.But in the lower left corner is a small tab that talks about privacy policy (or something like that.regardless).if you click that button,and click enough buttons,YouTube is accessible!...now you people may not care about it,and say,"so what,get over it,"or maybe you don't,but regardless of what you say or think,this is enough to say your game is not worth half a nickel.I'm not angry,or insulting,just very disturbed because of your lack of awareness in this matter.I have a  six and seven year old sibling who play on my IPad mini,and if one of them ever get access to YouTube,who knows what they'd find!their innocent little kids,and though you wouldn't ever hear from me again (with good reason),I'd be the first to tell every one who sees this app Not to get it because of it's dangerous and unlimited access to YouTube.others may not care,you may not even care.but unless this issue is fixed SOON,I will be very upset.please and thank you!ðŸ˜¤

Overall rating 7.8/10
This arcade,simple touch game is a worthwhile experience aim I personally think this app should be added to the best arcade games in App Store.just fix the adds issue,and you'll be set!
(And PLEASEPLEASEPLEASEPLEASE ADD MY SUGGESTED IDEAS IN A FUTURE UPDATEðŸ˜­)

This is an outstanding game  almost to the point that you can call it the best (in my opinion) my only problem with the game is that it lacks characters. I've played enough of the game to unlock all the characters and I think you should really add more characters otherwise this game is just phenomenal.
Beautiful nod to some classic and Nice platformer for your phone.

This game is a ton of fun! I have spent a lot of time on it. I decided to upgrade the character "sir jumpalot" which then gave me an extra life. But whatever coins I gather with him, while he is in his armor is lost once I get hit. It has made it very frustrating trying to get coins because every time I go on a massive run in my armor all my work in collecting coins is lost... Other than that the game is wonderful! I would defiantly recommend it to others!
This game is easily one of the best iOS games I have played in a long time. It looks good, responds to the inputs well, and it has great level designs.
Very fun and simple

>Play again and continue up to level 10+ until death from bad move
>Black ad screen of death pops up and have to restart game
>Rinse and repeat

I found out that when you play as the Knight with the upgrade, if you lose your armour you also lose all the coins you gained from that run so far which seems extremely unfair and I ask that it be fixed asap!
This game is great, but every time it gets past the load screen, it crashes. If you could fix this, all would be grand.

I know I should just email you but I don't know what you're email is so im just going to write it in the comments. so this is an amazing game but when I play it it makes me feel like there is something missing to the game, Later I realized was some kind of editor mode. I know it would take forever, but it would be so awesome. It isn't a demand so I wouldn't be mad at you if you didn't do it I would just be sad.

First of all, this is a great, simple game in my opinion. 
To save some of you the trouble of trial and error purchasing of upgrades:

Rosy cheeks boy- random bonus room spawns (no hazards and a ring of coins)
Knight- extra life
Radd Bradd- Wall Jump
Blue rodent- coin magnet
Space Girl- double jump 
Old Man Clive- score hack (start w/score at 3)
Plumber- jump on enemies to kill them
Ninja- teleport (swipe down before an obstacle)
Mr Smooth- dash (swipe left or right for a burst of speed)

You're welcome.
I love this game, and my only complaint is that after the new update, the game keeps crashing right away. Please fix.  Great game over all though.

title.label: Great game with a few glitches

content.label: I think this game is awesome, but there are a few glitches, such as when you die as the upgraded version of Sir Jumpalot and are reincarnated, all the coins you generated in your armor are lost. But other than a few minor glitches, this is a great game.
